main event: An aircraft observed an unidentified object by ground radar east of Kyushu Island, Japan, on August 6, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes,The object was confirmed visually by ground radar,An observer estimated the speed of the object at several thousand miles per hour,The object was described as an orange ball of light with a fluorescent trail,The object made a 90-degree turn and disappeared within 4 to 5 seconds.
sighted object: orange ball of light with a fluorescent trail
